comment: Way better than Google Dictionary and many more. You people are amazing. Loved it. Thank you for your efforts to make this.
i cant ever imagine what could be better
It's awesome, you can add your custom dictionaries and it works in PDFs.
This is quite a simple yet great extension for language learner! Thank you for making it!
great extension, I love this plugin and use it in my everyday life.
omg i love the anki feature . Thank you dev for creating such an amazing extension.

You are brilliant, thank you! I'm not sure why I dealt with you-know-who for so long. It seems that the majority of words I need to define are not available through the previous dictionary extension, so it became more of a nuisance than a convenience. Your extension appears to do exactly what such an extension is supposed to do. And, with the added features, a great deal more. I would give you 10/5 stars if possible. Thank you again!

This app took me a few minutes to figure out the settings that I wanted to get the functionality I desired... But woo boy! I finally have the perfect dictionary extension that I've been wanting. Edge/Chrome keep removing useful features like the 'Define' from the context menu. AI options are slow and inaccurate. This extension is quick and has a bevy of options for customizability. If I could afford to chip in, I would. It's really that much better than Google dictionary extension, which doesn't work on half the words you want it to.

By FAR, BEST dictionary extension I have tried. Recommended ones WOULDN'T EVEN WORK. This one fills the void I had from Safari's right click word look up function, but far more featured and customizable, if you so desire. Thanks River! I hope Mozilla starts actively monitoring so trustworthy security vouching brings you a greater audience.
This is the only working 'double-click a word and get a definition' dictionary add-on I could find. So thank you very much to the developer.
I finally found the best dictionary after trying so many. Simply a fantastic experience.

I just loved this. I had spent hours today searching for the perfect one and this is it! I especially love the ChatGPT as a dictionary feature and that I can look at the history of the words. Being able to create Anki deck is also very thoughtful. Thank you!
If you are a language learner, this extension is a must. Turns words you look up into flashcards with just a few clicks. Love it!
This is one of the best ideas I have come across in my twnty something years as a teacher of English.
